nodes.text: The Tython Orbital Station was a Republic space station that orbited the planet Tython during the Cold War and the subsequent Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

Located in the Deep Core's Tython system, the station served as a waystation for those arriving at the homeworld of the Jedi Order. As the planet had only two landing facilities, located at the Jedi Temple and the Masters' Retreat, travelers were required to dock their ship at the station and take a shuttle down to the planet's surface.

The Tython Orbital Station was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as the spaceport for the Republic-only planet Tython, and can only be accessed by Republic players with their own ship. Players then can take a shuttle down to the Jedi Temple on the planet's surface.
